comment: Previous versions were great. Bring back the fast forward / rewind 10s buttons and I will increase my rating... so annoying to use without these buttons.  Further suggestions: 1) Provide option to remove a program from the continue watching list. 2) Improve the suggestion system based off of previous reviews. This doesn't seem to work well at present. 3) Make programs more easily findable. Takes forever to find something to watch. Some good movies / series are on here but usually hard to find them.

author: Re-Shock 83
comment: Please fix the issue of not being able to watch or download anything on my phone. All I keep getting is an error message that says video can not be played. I should get a discount on my bill this month because this is week 2 with this issue!! I love Netflix so please fix this issue. Will change rating when I can watch content again.

author: Elias Cohenca
comment: I really like the app and Netflix in general. But I can't give it a higher score until they accept their app has a problem and fix it. Right now it's completely draining my battery in a few hours, rendering my phone unusable. Support just cleaned their hands of this problem even though there are several identical reports!

author: Mert Toprak
comment: Very easy to use, great contents and more than what you expect. But I have one problem. Although my phone is supported HD graphics to use, I can't watch HD (btw my phone is Samsung Galaxy J7 Prime). Also, I'm using 4K Ultra HD package. I don't why but I hope you update this problem as soon as possible.

author: sravani lingam
comment: It didn't even give a notification before free trail ends. And automatically 800 RS got debited without my permission and without any prior notification. How can they access my bank account!!! Too ridiculous 😏😏

author: Susan Schmidt
comment: I will change my review once they fix the glitch but all i see on my videos here are glitchy green screens along with the audio. Galaxy s8 active should be supported

author: Neil Stoker
comment: It's like a goldfish: practically every time you open it, it asks if Netflix can send your notifications. Of course you say no, it fails to remember and asks you again next time!

author: Burger Boy
comment: This is one of the best streaming movies and TV program! But the loading is still bothering me because it's taking forever! That's why I use the Wii U version of Netflix more. Until then,I hope u guys fix that!

author: Paul T
comment: You guys usually leads way in innovation for streaming video across various devices. My only one small issue is this latest update doesn't seem to allow you to browse by genre.

author: Sobhana F
comment: It was working great until recently on my chromebook. I'm unable to pause the show I'm watching and teh back arrow is unresponsive. The only way to exit the play screen is hitting the escape button. I even uninstalled and reinstalled the app just in case to see if that would fix it, but nothing has changed.

author: john rodermund
comment: All I get after most recent update is green screen. I can hear the movie playing but no visual. If it isnt a green screen, it just buffers for enternity...RIP

author: saumya verma
comment: Hi I was following a show on Netflix. Vampire diaries. But I can see only 7 seasons. I am not able to find season 8 . Pl help how can I see it. Is there any link or something

author: mr rebel
comment: Your search engine sucks! what the hell does magic mike have in common with the Santa Claus?! You consistently add Hindi and other foreign language movies! you barely add top movies!! Put it in a nutshell your just another scam artist ripping people off...and you will not be around much longer!

author: Mikey Ciancio
comment: Seriously the worst app I've ever come across. 90% of the time it just doesn't work. Every time I try watching something, my phone screen goes completely black and my phone freezes up.  Phone (Galaxy S8) and software are fully updated. This problem has persisted for months and months. It occasionally gets fixed. But it always comes back.  Sort it out Netflix

author: Samo Muránsky
comment: It was excellent until recently but extremely slow during last couple of weeks. Also, new UI is absoltely terrible compared to previous one. What used to be easily available slide menu is now on separate pages - why would you do that?

It's not  okay. This update I just downloaded has a bug problem. I cannot watch a movie because it just keep buffering and  buffering. Please fixes this bug problem.   I will give you 4 or 5 star thanks

author: Mike Smith
comment: This app is the worst. Impossible to use offline with all the restrictions and bugs. Offline use is primary reason I wanted to us this app. Amazon is so much better to use offline. I think its time to cancel Netflix.

author: Johanna Lopez
comment: I love Netflix BUT WHAT HAPPENED TO BOBS BURGERS? (Do you get the joke though 😏what happened to no no ok....😐) and why did you guys also took away Under the same moon I loved that movie 😠

author: Elizabeth Morin
comment: I loved this app, but now it just sucks. It logs me out whenever it wants, won't let me sign back in, and the video quality sucks. Really annoying.  Update: The app isn't working again. Everything takes hours to load or doesn't at all. Can't watch shows back-to-back because of a faulty code. On top of it all, it crashes . . . often. It's not even fun to watch anymore as I am constantly worried that if I skip forward three seconds, it will break.

author: Veridiano Santos
comment: Dear Netflix. I am completely disappointed with your app. I installed it on my Samsung galaxy s7 edge, and when I tried to play a video I got stuck on that annoying loading screen. I called your support and they couldn't fix it. Hope you guys are working on it. I am running android 7.0

author: Alec Benson
comment: When Chromecasting with versions 5.14 or 5.13 from a Nexus 5, CPU usage is extremely high resulting in overheating and massive battery drain. This bug does not occur in versions 5.12 and earlier. I'm not the only one reporting this issue.

author: Johnny Kung
comment: Freezes at the end of each episode or when you try to leave the app. Sometimes it stucks at the start screen. I have to keep restarting my phone. None of the updates fixes the problem. It's a paid app. With monthly subscription. Fix it, Netflix !

author: Chris Boi
comment: DONTCHA HATE WHEN YOU FINISH A BEAUTIFUL SHOW ON A TV STREAMING VERSION AND NETFLIX JUST GOES, HAY PAL, HERE'S SOME OTHER SHOW THATS GONNA RUIN YOUR MOMENT. NOW YOU HAVE 11 SECONDS TO ENJOY THE CREDITS BEFORE WE FORCE FEED YOU THIS SHOW YOU DIDN'T WANT.

author: sarah stewart
comment: Until the latest update this app worked fine on my Lenovo tablet. Now it either won't open or fails to play what ever I click on. It sits there loading, for 20 mins one time! Really disappointed 👎😭

author: Erik Metcalfe
comment: It took 2 hours to try and watch a show. Now I can't even remember the show I was trying to watch thanks another stopping my membership tomorrow it's just to much work. One credit card change and your a stranger to a at least 5 year account

author: Robert Stanton
comment: The Netflix app used to be good but it has been updated and now it is worse than ever. Before you could search by genre and now that feature has been taken away. Why would you update an app by removing features? Whoever is responsible for this app is a moron and should be fired

author: Xcited Bangyalldead
comment: Still get only a loading screen then when it finally loads (even on WiFi, mind you) after 2 hours all I get is audio and a green screen I have already called in and contacted you guys, was told the problem would be handled with an update, but the update came and I still have the same exact problem still, thank you but no thank you. I'll just cancel my service with you and stick with hulu

author: Jorge Ceballos
comment: Heavy battery drain and high temperature while running in background. Force stop helps for a bit until app reloads on its own.

author: Calem Dunphy
comment: Will change reveiw when fixed. This Netflix app never seems able to actually play any movies/tv shows. Once I click Play the app freaks out and eventually crashes. Or if it manages to play it will get stuck on a frame while the audio plays. Very glitchy better to use a computer.

author: Andrew Turincio
comment: When using chromecast, automatically switches sound option to Dolby 5.1 stereo instead of just regular 5.1. Please give option to make default sound option.  Also in recent update, occasionally the picture will get severely pixelated as if a cable was broken to the TV and sending  poor signal. It's not a bad image quality issue, it's just a bunch of color and pixels (like a brown screen). Furthermore, it has been very buggy over WiFi and loses connection, even though YouTube or other streaming services are fine. Constantly shows error 5.2. Still an issue after latest update (2/3/18) V30

author: WizardRoom 36886
comment: Anybody else experiencing a completely green a different colored screen then what you are supposed to see for me I see an all green screen but YouTube works fine fix your app plz no fun when it don't work otherwise it is great

author: Mike Connors
comment: Chromebook support is broke... I can play a movie/show but after a few minutes the app becomes unresponsive (all the buttons), only way to pause or change a espisode is to force close the app. Chrome OS 64- Acer R11

author: Sam Watt
comment: Every time I exit the app and go back in it says error we could not play your video, and the only thing to stop that is to delete the app then redownload it again, it's super annoying but overall it's a good app with many movies and shows

author: Mikael Tan
comment: New update is horrible. Without the 10s forward/rewind feature it's super annoying to skip scenes/intros. And without the "next episode" button, i have to scroll through the long list of episodes to watch the new one. Don't know why it was removed shortly after it was implemented... Moreover the home buttons are stuck and won't go away. It's uncomfortable to immerse ourselves in what we're watching when there's a centimeter of buttons blocking a part of the screen.

author: Damion Stoen
comment: Honestly this app used to be amazing it used to be my go to for any video streaming, but now it sucks because it's a majority of anime thats not even in english and cruddy Netflix originals. The only reason I didn't give one star is because it still has a few decent selections, but I'm probably gonna cancel my subscription soon

author: Juan Castaneda
comment: Often the Chromecast icon won't appear, and for the love of God, bring back the old rating system.  Edit: why was the double tap to fast forward/rewind feature removed?

author: G.K. Manjunath
comment: Need 10sec or 5Sec forward and rewind buttons in app and the seeking bar is not accurate if we seek to 1.50sec it plays at 1.40 if you seek to 2.00 still it plays at 1.40. It's annoying irritating, update Android app pls

author: Jarie Suicune
comment: Huge failings with many foreign shows not containing the original language track if an English dub exists (many of the anime provided are easy examples), not even when the region settings are set to that language or multiple other dubs are provided! Give us the option of the ORIGINAL or none! If not for a select few Netflix only titles, I would rate 1 Star and remove forever.

author: Parris-jordan Williams
comment: When I just started using the app it was great but then it updated and my ratings went down was working fine on my phone but now I can't if get it to load to the home page. All the updates after that didn't even fix it. I would really like to start using my phone again and for this problem to be fixed.

author: shawna McConnell
comment: I am giving it 4 stars because wuth the recent updates I can't watch it more than 5 minutes without it stopping and it's hit or miss if I can start it back or not.
